products.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
products.description: A popular indoor plant known for its large, glossy green leaves.
products.review: Very easy to care for and looks great in living rooms.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor tree; grows slowly and may reach 3 meters indoors; prefers stable temperature.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow soil to dry between waterings
products.careTips: Rotate regularly, wipe leaves to remove dust, avoid overwatering.

products.name: Snake Plant
products.description: Low-maintenance indoor plant perfect for bedrooms.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial succulent; slow-growing; very hardy indoor plant.
products.careTips: Avoid overwatering; tolerate neglect.

products.name: Peace Lily
products.description: An elegant indoor plant admired for its graceful white flowers
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; blooms throughout year under proper care.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; keep soil moist but not soggy
products.careTips: Wipe leaves, remove faded flowers, avoid cold drafts.

products.name: Zanzibar Gem
products.description: Tough and resilient plant for low-light areas.
products.review: Very hardy, almost impossible to kill!
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; extremely tolerant to neglect and low light.
products.careTips: Avoid overwatering; can survive in shade.

products.name: Monstera Deliciosa
products.description: An iconic tropical plant celebrated for its glossy split leaves
products.lifeCycle: Perennial climber; can grow large indoors with support; leaves develop fenestrations with age.
products.soilType: Well-draining potting soil rich in organic matter
products.careTips: Support climbing, rotate plant, wipe leaves.

products.name: Pothos
products.description: Easy-care trailing plant with cascading vines and lush leaves.
products.review: Great for hanging baskets or shelves.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor vine; grows moderately fast; can trail or climb supports.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow top inch of soil to dry
products.careTips: Prune regularly to maintain shape, avoid overwatering, can be grown in water.

products.name: Rubber Plant
products.description: Bold, glossy leaves make a striking statement indoors.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor tree; slow to medium growth; can reach 2-3 meters indoors.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow topsoil to dry between waterings
products.careTips: Wipe leaves to remove dust, rotate for even growth, avoid overwatering.

products.name: Dracaena
products.description: Elegant indoor plant with sword-like leaves.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; slow to medium growth; can reach 1.5-2 meters indoors.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; let topsoil dry between waterings
products.toxicity: Mildly toxic to pets if ingested
products.careTips: Remove yellow leaves, rotate for even growth, avoid overwatering.

products.name: Calathea
products.description: Beautiful patterned leaves thrive well in shaded areas.
products.review: Leaves move with light, very decorative.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; moderate growth; ideal for low-light indoor areas.
products.wateringNeeds: Keep soil consistently moist but not waterlogged
products.careTips: Mist regularly, avoid cold drafts, wipe leaves gently.

products.name: Parlor Palm
products.description: Classic indoor palm that thrives in low-light spaces.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor palm; slow growth; thrives in low-light indoor spaces.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow top layer of soil to dry between waterings
products.careTips: Rotate for even growth, avoid overwatering, remove dead fronds.

products.name: Spider Plant
products.description: Air-purifying indoor plant with long, arching leaves.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; fast-growing; produces spiderettes for easy propagation.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow top layer to dry slightly between waterings
products.careTips: Trim brown tips, avoid overwatering, can be grown in hanging baskets.

products.name: Philodendron
products.description: Vining plant perfect for shelves or hanging baskets.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor vine; medium to fast growth; can climb or trail.
products.careTips: Support climbing stems, prune to shape, avoid direct sunlight.

products.name: Chinese Evergreen
products.description: Colorful foliage indoor plant, low-light tolerant.
products.review: Leaves have beautiful patterns and colors.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; slow to medium growth; tolerant of low light.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow top layer of soil to dry
products.careTips: Avoid cold drafts, wipe leaves to remove dust, keep soil slightly moist.

products.name: Dracaena Marginata
products.description: Thin, upright leaves add a touch of vertical style.
products.review: Very elegant and easy to maintain.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial indoor plant; slow to medium growth; adds vertical style indoors.
products.wateringNeeds: Moderate; allow topsoil to dry between waterings
products.toxicity: Mildly toxic to pets if ingested
products.careTips: Rotate for even growth, remove yellow leaves, avoid overwatering.

products.name: Aloe Vera
products.description: Succulent indoor plant known for its healing properties.

products.wateringNeeds: Low; allow soil to dry completely between waterings
products.toxicity: Mildly toxic to pets if ingested
products.careTips: Avoid overwatering, place in sunny spot, remove dead leaves.

products.name: Lavender
products.description: Fragrant outdoor herb with vibrant purple summer flowers.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial herb; moderate growth; thrives in full sun and well-draining soil.
products.wateringNeeds: Low to moderate; drought-tolerant once established
products.careTips: Prune after flowering, ensure good air circulation, avoid waterlogging.

products.name: Rose Bush
products.description: Classic garden rose with large, colorful seasonal blooms.
products.lifeCycle: Perennial flowering shrub; moderate growth; blooms repeatedly in season.
products.careTips: Prune annually, deadhead spent flowers, fertilize regularly.

products.name: Hydrangea
